REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2231 reute d f BC-FAIR-LANES-<FAIR>-SHA 03-26 0065

TEXT.TITLE: FAIR LANES <FAIR> SHAREHOLDERS APPROVE MERGER
TEXT.BODY: Fair Lanes Inc said its shareholders approved the previously announced merger with Maricorp Inc, a unit of <Northern Pacific Corp>. Under terms of the merger, Fair Lanes said each of its shares of common stock will be converted into the right to receive 1.3043 shares of <BTR Realty Inc>, which is owned by Fair Lines. Reuter
